languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, здесь настолько скучно, что даже с той стороны уже в дверку никто не стучится — все шепотки подохли от ожидания ну хоть чего-то стоящего! Может, ну его, воротимся на корабль?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, здесь настолько скучно, что даже с той стороны уже в дверку никто не стучится — все шепотки подохли от ожидания ну хоть чего-то стоящего! Может, ну его, воротимся на корабль?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, здесь настолько скучно, что даже с той стороны уже в дверку никто не стучится — все шепотки подохли от ожидания ну хоть чего-то стоящего! Может, ну его, воротимся на корабль?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，这个地方实在是太无聊了，就连另一边的敲门声都没有了。那些家伙意识到这里没有任何有趣的事情，甚至都不再窃窃私语了！咱们就不能回到船上去吗？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这个地方实在是太无聊了，就连另一边的敲门声都没有了。那些家伙意识到这里没有任何有趣的事情，甚至都不再窃窃私语了！咱们就不能回到船上去吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, este lugar es tan monótono que ni siquiera llaman al otro lado de la puerta: ¡todos los susurros se acallaron cuando comprendieron que no iba a suceder nada interesante! ¿No podemos volver a la nave?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, este lugar es tan monótono que ni siquiera llaman al otro lado de la puerta: ¡todos los susurros se acallaron cuando comprendieron que no iba a suceder nada interesante! ¿No podemos volver a la nave?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この場所って、ドアの向こう側のノック音すら無くて退屈ね―ささやく声も、興味をひくものが何もないと分かって静まりかえってるのよ！船に戻ってはダメかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この場所って、ドアの向こう側のノック音すら無くて退屈ね―ささやく声も、興味をひくものが何もないと分かって静まりかえってるのよ！船に戻ってはダメかしら？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, cet endroit est si décourageant que je n'entends plus rien de l'autre côté de la porte... Tous les murmures se sont tus dès qu'ils ont compris qu'il n'allait rien se passer d'intéressant ! Vous ne voulez pas qu'on retourne au vaisseau ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, cet endroit est si décourageant que je n'entends plus rien de l'autre côté de la porte... Tous les murmures se sont tus dès qu'ils ont compris qu'il n'allait rien se passer d'intéressant ! Vous ne voulez pas qu'on retourne au vaisseau ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, dieser Ort ist so langweilig, dass nicht einmal an der anderen Seite der Tür geklopft wird – jedes Flüstern ist verstummt, als sie erkannten, dass nichts Interessantes passieren wird! Können wir nicht zum Schiff zurückkehren?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, dieser Ort ist so langweilig, dass nicht einmal an der anderen Seite der Tür geklopft wird – jedes Flüstern ist verstummt, als sie erkannten, dass nichts Interessantes passieren wird! Können wir nicht zum Schiff zurückkehren?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, burası öylesine sıkıcı ki diğer taraftan kapıyı çalan kimse bile yok... İlginç hiçbir şey olmayacağını fark ettiklerinde tüm fısıltılar kesildi! Gemiye dönsek olmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this place is so dull there's not even any knocking on the other side of the door — all the whispers died down when they realised nothing interesting was going to happen! Can't we go back to the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, burası öylesine sıkıcı ki diğer taraftan kapıyı çalan kimse bile yok... İlginç hiçbir şey olmayacağını fark ettiklerinde tüm fısıltılar kesildi! Gemiye dönsek olmaz mı?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
